name: Fear Till Death:Chapter 1
description: Hi my name is Micheal but people call me keli, I'm a 14 year old kid that likes making games.This is my first horror game that i am uploading,This game in no more than 20 minutes . Big thanks to these 2 developers Jimmy vegas and user1 Productions without Jimmy vegas i wouldn't download some of his assets and without user1 productions i wouldn't have a HUD for the game.Enjoy
